requirements.description: The Partner's use of the Services is only permissible if it is in a manner consistent with this Agreement and the Services Documentation
Compliance with all Applicable Rules, including data protection and privacy laws, is mandatory for the Partner

type.summary: Compliance with Applicable Rules and Laws

requirements.description: Accessing, collecting, using, and sharing End Users' data by the Partner can only be done in compliance with applicable rules
The Partner must post a privacy policy in their App that adheres to all applicable rules, laws, acts, and regulations
Any information relating to End Users that will be provided or is accessible to ironSource must be legally disclosed in the privacy policy

type.summary: Disclosure of Data Access to ironSource

requirements.description: The privacy policy should include an opt-out mechanism for End Users regarding targeted ads based on their behavior and interests
The Partner confirms having read and understood the IronSource Mobile Privacy Policy
The Partner confirms that their privacy policy is consistent with the IronSource Mobile Privacy Policy
